text: A wid iumnen! Utubet Oebbi, ppuba n uuee! Ahat Mass nnwen ad awen Ikkes tucmitin nnwen, u a kwen Issekcem ar Loennet, ddaw as isaffen ppazzalen. Assen, Oebbi ur Isdullu Nnbi akked wid iumnen yides. Tafat nnsen teppeddu zdat sen, u yeffus nnsen. Ad qqaoen: "a Mass nne$! Tim ane$ tafat nne$, Semmee ane$; ih, Kecc, Tzemrev i yal cci
